IC.LIR
Class ClassLayout

java.lang.Object
  IC.LIR.ClassLayout

public class ClassLayout
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an IC class' structure (field offsets and DV) This class calculates the offsets and DV of each IC class according to its superclass.

Author:
ehud

Method Detail

NewClassLayout

public static ClassLayout NewClassLayout(IC.AST.ICClass classDecl)
A factory for class layouts. This is needed because each class layout is dependent of its parent's class layout.
